pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā bhikkhū vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti—dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.4_0: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—“etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā—dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.4_2: Kena nu kho mayaṁ upāyena samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vaseyyāma,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.6_0: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.7_0: Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—“alaṁ, āvuso, kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.8_0: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ harāma. Evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.9_0: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.10_0: Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—“alaṁ, āvuso; kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena. Kiṁ gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ haṭena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.11_0: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissāma—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.14_0: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.15_1: yo amhākaṁ gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.16_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.17_0: “asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī …pe… asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.18_0: Atha kho te manussā—“lābhā vata no,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.18_2: yesaṁ no evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.18_3: na vata no ito pubbe evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.19_0: Te na tādisāni bhojanāni attanā bhuñjanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.19_1: mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti yādisāni bhikkhūnaṁ denti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.20_0: Na tādisāni khādanīyāni sāyanīyāni pānāni attanā khādanti sāyanti pivanti mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.20_1: denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.21_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū vaṇṇavā ahesuṁ pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.1_0: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ vassaṁvuṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.2_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena vesālī tena pakkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.3_0: Anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhū kisā honti lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.6_0: Vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.7_0: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.8_0: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.10_0: kacci samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.13_0: Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.14_0: Kālaṁ viditvā pucchanti, kālaṁ viditvā na pucchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.17_0: Dvīhākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti—“dhammaṁ vā desessāma,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.18_0: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—“yathā kathaṁ pana tumhe,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.18_2: samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.19_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.23_2: udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.25_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.26.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṁ āroceyya bhūtasmiṁ, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.6_0: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā, avaseso anupasampanno nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.10_0: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ, dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.12_0: suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.14_0: suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.16_0: suññatā samāpatti, animittā samāpatti, appaṇihitā samāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.24_0: rāgassa pahānaṁ, dosassa pahānaṁ, mohassa pahānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.26_0: rāgā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā, dosā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā, mohā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.2_0: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjin”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.4_0: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjāmī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.6_0: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpanno”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.8_0: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhimhī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.10_0: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamassa jhānassa vasimhī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.12_0: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.16_4: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.23_4: appaṇihito samādhi sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.27_4: appaṇihitā samāpatti sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.29_4: tisso vijjā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.33_4: cattāro iddhipādā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.36_4: pañca balāni sacchikatāni mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.38_4: satta bojjhaṅgā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.40_4: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.45_4: arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.49_0: moho me catto, vanto, mutto, pahīno,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.53_0: mohā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.58_4: suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.2_3: paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.2_4: paṭhamañca jhānaṁ dutiyañca jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.5_3: paṭhamassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi;

pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.12_3: paṭhamassa ca jhānassa appaṇihitassa ca samādhissa lābhimhi, vasimhi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.12_4: paṭhamañca jhānaṁ appaṇihito ca samādhi sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.16_3: paṭhamassa ca jhānassa appaṇihitāya ca samāpattiyā lābhimhi, vasimhi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.16_4: paṭhamañca jhānaṁ appaṇihitā ca samāpatti sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.18_0: anupasampannassa— “paṭhamañca jhānaṁ tisso ca vijjā samāpajjiṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.18_3: paṭhamassa ca jhānassa tissannañca vijjānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.18_4: paṭhamañca jhānaṁ tisso ca vijjā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.22_3: paṭhamassa ca jhānassa catunnañca iddhipādānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi;

pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.15_0: anupasampannassa— “yo te vihāre vasi so bhikkhu suññataṁ samāpattiṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.17_4: tena bhikkhunā appaṇihitā samāpatti sacchikatā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.19_0: anupasampannassa— “yo te vihāre vasi so bhikkhu tisso vijjā …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.33_0: moho catto, vanto, mutto, pahīno, paṭinissaṭṭho, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.36_0: mohā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.38_0: anupasampannassa— “yo te vihāre vasi so bhikkhu suññāgāre paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.39_0: dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.41_1: so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī, vasī;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.41_2: tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.46_0: yo te gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñji so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.46_3: so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī, vasī;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.46_4: tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.52_0: yena te gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro paribhutto so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.52_3: so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī, vasī;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.52_4: tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.58_0: gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ adāsi so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.59_2: so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī, vasī;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.5.59_3: tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.
